geminitranslator-desc: AI-powered translation of page content using Google Gemini.
geminitranslator-login-required: Please [[Special:UserLogin|log in]] to view or generate translations.
geminitranslator-viewing-live: Translated Content: This page is a real-time translation of [[$1|$2]].
geminitranslator-error-no-api-key: Gemini API key is missing or not configured.
geminitranslator-error-bad-response: Received an invalid response from the Gemini API.
